ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Austrian Double Star Parameters Data Center
ResourceHeader.Description: This site provides access to prime parameter and summary parameter data from the Double Star mission. Some of this data is proprietary and subject to access controls. Please read their rules of use, or see the Double Star Data System Users Guide.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: ESA, Double Star, Center for Space Science and Applied Research, and the Chinese Academy of Sciences
